properties.title: R %VER% for Mac OS X 10.9 or higher (Mavericks build)

pkmkdoc.description: R %VER% for Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks) and higher. This package contains Mavericks build of R for 64-bit Intel Macs. This package includes the R %VER% framework and R GUI %GUIVER%.

choice.title: R %VER% Framework
choice.description: R framework version %VER% (64-bit, Intel Macs only) for Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks) or higher. This package contains the full framework necessary for the use of R.

choice.title: R GUI %GUIVER%
choice.tooltip: R for Mac OS X GUI %GUIVER% Application
choice.description: This is the Mac GUI application for R. It requires a compatible R framework to be installed as well.

choice.title: Tcl/Tk 8.6.0
choice.description: Tcl/Tk 8.6.0 build (X11 version) for Mac OS X 10.6 and higher (64-bit, Intel). Needed for the tcltk R package.

choice.title: Texinfo 5.2
choice.description: Texinfo 5.2 for Mac OS X 10.6 and higher (64-bit Intel). Needed for building documentation when compiling R packages from sources.

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1265\cocoasubrtf210 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;\f1\fnil\fcharset0 Monaco;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red1\green0\blue144;} \pard\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640\qc
\f0\b\fs48 \cf0 R %VER%\
\b0\fs26 Version %VERFULL%\
\fs24 for Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks) and higher\ \pard\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640 \cf0 \ This multi-package contains following main components:\ - \b R Framework %VER% \b0 - \b R.app GUI %GUIVER% \b0 \ - \b Tcl/Tk 8.6.0 for X11 \b0 (optional, needed for the tcltk R package)\ - \b Texinfo 5.2 \b0 (optional, needed to build documentation in R packages from sources)\ \ \pard\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640 \cf0 \ul \ulc0 Requirements:\ \pard\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640 \cf0 \ulnone - Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks) or higher\ \ \pard\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640
\b \cf0 \ul Note \b0 :\ulnone By default the installer upgrades previous Mavericks build of R if present. If you want to keep the previous version, use\
\f1 \cf2 pkgutil --forget org.r-project.R.mavericks.fw.pkg \f0 \cf0 \ \ The Cocoa GUI called \b R.app \b0 will be installed by default in your \f1 Applications \f0 folder, \b R framework \b0 will be installed in \f1 /Library/Frameworks, \f0 \b Tcl/Tk \b0 and \b Texinfo \b0 will be installed in \f1 /usr/local}

requirement.message: This build of R requires Mac OS X 10.9 or higher.
